description:
Easy, reliable PDF creation from all applications.


- rollup of various PDF-related bug fixes
- embedded files in PDF files are now preserved when PDF files are directly opened in pdfFactory
- ZUGFeRD/Factur-X metadata is now preserved when PDF files are directly opened in pdfFactory, and the generated PDF file will be ZUGFeRD-compliant.
- NOTE: ZUGFeRD files must be in PDF/A-3b format. If the output PDF level in pdfFactory is set to anything other than Automatic or PDF/A-3b, the resulting PDF file will not be a valid ZUGFeRD file.
